TEXT.TITLE: APPLIED DNA SYSTEMS <ADNA> NAMES NEW OFFICERS
TEXT.BODY:
Applied DNA Systems Inc said Kenneth Blackman was named vice president and chief operating officer, and its chairman, Donald Bachmann, was named to the additional post of chief executive officer. The company said the company position of president will be left vacant with the retirement of Maurice Sussman, who was also the chief executive officer. The company said the chief operating officer's post is newly created. Blackman was executive vice president and chief operating officer with <BW Biotec Inc.>
Reuter
